1. Call meeting to order and roll call

3. Adjourn

Wissports is asking Wisconsin Schools to join the #BeTheLightWI Campaign to spread support and hope for spring 2020 high school student-athletes who have not been able to participate in their given sport. Schools across the state are being asked to turn the lights on their stadium at 8:00 PM on April 10th. To honor our 2020 spring athletes, the School District of Mondovi will turn on the lights of the football stadium for 20 minutes starting at 8:00 on Friday, April 10th. #mondovipride
